channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1970; 10:13PM; 3548 W Stocker St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MntVAi; #LeimertPark; Two-story vacant duplex, over parking, with fire showing. An auto fire in the rear exposed the structure to flames. The first 32 firefighters extinguished the flames in 20 minutes. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 94; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 10; BC11 BC18 CM20 CM22 E226 E26 E266 E294 E34 E46 E68 EM11 RA834 RA94 T26 T66 T94; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Update Physical Rescue; INC#1824; 09:24PM; WB 10 Fwy x Cloverfield Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/45LIjcx; #SantaMonica; LAFD and SMFD responded to the rollover with one trapped patient. Crews extricated the patient and transported the approximately 35-year-old male in moderate condition. CHP Log #3221. Nothing further.; FS 125; Batt 22; Council District outside city; BC18 E237 E292 E43 E59 EM14 HR3 RA59 RA92 T37 T92; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#1824; 08:24PM; WB 10 Fwy x Cloverfield Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Sk72l0; #Sawtelle; Two-vehicle collision (with rollover). Firefighters working to extricate one trapped patient.; FS 92; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; E292 E59 RA92 T92; CH4; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1323; 05:11PM; 8911 N Moorcroft Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QeB5rz; #WestHills; It took 72 firefighters, by ground and air, approximately 90 minutes to extinguish the 5-acre fire burning near the west end of Nordhoff (west of Topanga). Crews have containment lines surrounding the fire and will remain on scene for "mop up" (eliminating all hot spots and smoldering material within the burn). No structures damaged. No injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 BC17 BC5 CE83 CM20 CM22 CM40 CM42 DZ41 DZ45 E1 E10 E103 E105 E106 E107 E27 E29 E290 E296 E305 E472 E64 E66 E90 E94 EM17 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 HE1 HT3 PI3 RA104 T105 T90 WT77 WT88; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Grass Fire; INC#1259; 04:07PM; NB 110 Fwy x Anaheim St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3s8Apw1; #Wilmington; Twenty LAFD firefighters responded to the grass fire (with some tree involvement) and held the burn to less than one-half-acre in under an hour. No structures damaged. No injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E36 E38 E85 T38; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1120; 04:08PM; 12246 W Victory Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FzEJaP; #NorthHollywood; Firefighters attacked 5 separate small spot fires by ground and air along a 1.5-mile stretch of the 170 freeway. After approximately two hours of battling fires in 15 - 20 mph wind, crews have achieved 100% containment on all fires in the vicinity. No injuries. No structures damaged. Lanes on Freeway and Victory slowly opening. Cause under investigation.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AO1 AO2 AR1 BC12 BC14 BC17 BC5 CM40 CM42 E1 E10 E102 E260 E27 E278 E29 E39 E60 E64 E66 E73 E75 E76 E77 E81 E86 E89 E90 E94 EA1 EM14 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA4 HE1 PI1 RA78 RA86 T60 T78 WT77 WT88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1323; 03:42PM; 8911 N Moorcroft Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3QeB5rz; #WestHills; Approximately 5 acres of grass burning with 20+ mph winds. Currently, no structures threatened. Ventura County FD and LA County FD both sending a full brush response in automatic aid.; FS 96; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC12 BC15 CM20 CM22 E103 E105 E106 E107 E290 E296 E305 E472 E90 EM17 H1 H3 H4 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 T105 T90; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

Grass Fire; INC#1259; 03:15PM; NB 110 Fwy x Anaheim St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3s8Apw1; #Wilmington; One-half (0.5) acre of grass burning, slow rate of spread. No structures threatened.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E38 E85 T38; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#1120; 02:15PM; 12246 W Victory Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3FzEJaP; #NorthHollywood; Approximately one-quarter (0.25) acre of brush burning near the 170 Freeway at Victory Blvd, with at least 15mph winds blowing out of the northeast. Firefighters attacking the flames by ground and air.Multiple spot fires on either side of the freeway. Motorists: Victory will be closed in both directions, and the 170 Freeway will be closed in both directions from Magnolia to Sherman Way.; FS 89; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 2; AO1 AO2 AR1 BC12 BC14 BC17 CM40 CM42 E1 E10 E260 E278 E29 E39 E60 E64 E66 E76 E77 E86 E89 E90 E94 EM14 H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA4 RA78 RA86 T60 T78 WT77 WT88; CH5; 17; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0749; 10:59AM; 6300 N Balboa Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3tgQyeW; #SepulvedaBasin; Crews held the fire to approximately one-eighth of an acre in less than 30 minutes. No structures damaged. No reported injuries.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; AO1 AO2 BC10 BC15 BC17 BP99 CM20 CM22 CM40 CM42 E100 E239 E273 E290 E39 E64 E66 E73 E83 E88 E90 E94 EM15 H0B H0C H1 H3 H4 H7 HA1 HA3 HA4 HA7 RA100 SO1 T39 T73 T90 WT88; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange
